title: Capabilities
items: Cook yummy meals without needing to measure ingredients
Carry any amount of grocery bags in a single trip
Speedrun any task with Mario Kart Star Music 10 hours

title: Accomplishments
items: Survived two separate graduations in pouring rain
Crowned the Four Square King in elementary school
Defeated 6th grade teacher in a typing contest for a milkshake

title: Misdemeanors
items: Enjoys chewing bubble gum but can't blow bubbles
Calls the action of turning off a light as 'close the light'
Has a confusing one-word, all-lowercase WiFi password
